channel.title: How to send & receive BAY with Web-based Marketplace (WMP) wallet
channel.description:
# How to send & receive BAY with Web-based Marketplace (WMP) wallet
### **How to receive BAY** 1. From the “**Account**” page, click the “**Addresses**” tab on the left side of the page. Here, you will see your “Primary Address” (aka public key), which can be copied and pasted for sending funds to the wallet.
_Alternatively, you can also click the “Balance” icon in the upper left corner of any page, and then click “Copy address”._
**![|547x158](/uploads/default/original/1X/bd8058542ed18a543a865c6e274352761ea4de78.png)**
### How to send BAY To send funds out of your web marketplace wallet, click the “**Balance**” icon in the upper left corner of any page.
**![|307x182](/uploads/default/original/1X/6d89ecce573e16ba0e5f2b4cc2c02ec22c16b5f0.png)** \ \ Then click, “**Make Transfer**."
**![|248x233](/uploads/default/original/1X/7c0c73e0d878bf1902375ba1e2dc908f2392f5ae.png)** \ \ Next, enter/paste in a compatible BAY receive address, and also enter the amount of BAY you would like to send. Then click, “**Send coins**”.
**![|363x264](/uploads/default/original/1X/75c1a01b0e8c152cd9e4c1d6138f3ec92d0b845e.png)**
You can view all transactions (including pending) at https://chainz.cryptoid.info/bay/.

item.title: How to send & receive BAY with Web-based Marketplace (WMP) wallet
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.description:
@tradersnow wrote:

How to send & receive BAY with Web-based Marketplace (WMP) wallet

How to receive BAY

  1. From the “Account” page, click the “Addresses” tab on the left side of the page. Here, you will see your “Primary Address” (aka public key), which can be copied and pasted for sending funds to the wallet.

    Alternatively, you can also click the “Balance” icon in the upper left corner of any page, and then click “Copy address”.

ei5MCduFOVnCX7y3gkjd99tk1v0R1Db1TPW_KFPTBV-_3FJ2rnSMm8kzIfKe1VyWLUGFFAfvm_mbgNwQMyBv9iDUPmVPYNfiitPFb41CVrDv_THOm4pzBavo6eoryYOvt3IIafIn.png1600x457 124 KB

How to send BAY

To send funds out of your web marketplace wallet, click the “Balance” icon in the upper left corner of any page.

kd0Lo9bwbXexpYyAfaLpw6brr61pncGy2FfRE2KK3gpq2yz8kHuwdRo2w0bKVAFwXkMmcYK5g-7i1fmPWTcw_5xTq96YxfqVZssBM9ycNbYss2dAn6wYUfv5FeFoDxKVlkYtZubx.png1148x680 303 KB



Then click, “Make Transfer."

l0xpFUZak_a36m3JNQAyicf44f_XMiiippThOheb76SmWY1-G5Srxnp4SopY-H5X4QSXU1Oj5n9RNx-oYgPcDtAWcR0WwLvcCflUZBluYgNBZ39YuXIJnHBOJIk3E0oxe4uv2Yqu.png586x552 25.1 KB



Next, enter/paste in a compatible BAY receive address, and also enter the amount of BAY you would like to send. Then click, “Send coins”.

IrvOrq7rkQH9mBo2_QJUEfC3CcTO3Bsfby4Ko66EuilDRpLaQ0uuopBoccgc7OU9SUNPc5sBoGH0rkeBSuP2MNb9re9-TWHv7lOXqctABSZodlmFnIRhLD4z7OpOsxcl7y-EYWxP.png1072x778 50.9 KB

You can view all transactions (including pending) at https://chainz.cryptoid.info/bay/.
